metadata.description: Comprehensive timeline model for Revenue Stream Hijacking case 2025-137857 with proper phase classification and complete evidence integration
metadata.changes: Complete phase classification (PHASE_1, PHASE_2, PHASE_3), enhanced evidence references from ad-res-j7, added motive timeline

phases.PHASE_1: Foundation and Setup (2017-2024-04-23) - Business operations before Kayla's death
phases.PHASE_2: Trigger and Appropriation (2024-04-24 to 2025-03-31) - Kayla's death triggers business appropriation
phases.PHASE_3: Fraud Execution and Discovery (2025-04-01 onwards) - Active fraud, discovery, and legal response

timeline_entries.title: First ReZonance Invoice to RST
timeline_entries.description: First invoice from ReZonance to RegimA Skin Treatments for Google GSuite services (R250.80), marking the beginning of business relationship

evidence_support.timeline_correlation: JF9 - Timeline shows immediate system access changes

timeline_entries.title: ReZonance Service Expansion
timeline_entries.description: Major service expansion with multiple enterprise services (R100,000+), substantial increase in service provision and financial exposure

evidence: JF8 - Evidence packages started next day
evidence_support.significance: Attempted evidence destruction, but JF1 proves prior state
evidence_support.criminal_implication: Destruction of evidence, obstruction of justice

timeline_entries.title: Financial Year Commencement RST/SLG
timeline_entries.description: Financial year commencement for RegimA Skin Treatments and Strategic Logistics, beginning of period covered by trial balance evidence

timeline_entries.title: Financial Year Commencement Villa Via
timeline_entries.description: Villa Via operates on different financial year, creating complexity in group reporting and enabling profit extraction concealment

timeline_entries.title: Multiple Adjusting Journal Entries
timeline_entries.description: Significant inter-company cost reallocations: RWW R500K stock provision write-back, RWW R810K admin fee reallocation, SLG R252K admin fee reallocation, SLG R80K production cost transfer to RST

timeline_entries.title: Year-End Adjustments and Interest Payment
timeline_entries.description: SLG pays R414,334.09 interest to RST per loan agreement, RST advances R750K loan to RWW for production costs, Directors' fee adjustment R784K in RST

timeline_entries.title: Villa Via Year-End Profit Extraction
timeline_entries.description: Villa Via generates R4.4M monthly rental income with R3.7M profit, Members loan account R22.8M indicating systematic capital extraction

timeline_entries.title: Bantjies Trial Balance Email Distribution
timeline_entries.description: Email from Danie Bantjies with final trial balances to Bernadine Wright, Jax, Peter, Rynette, Daniel for financial statement finalization meeting

timeline_entries.title: ReZonance Opening Balance Debt
timeline_entries.description: Opening balance showing substantial accumulated debt to ReZonance (R971,587.93), evidence of unpaid services over extended period

timeline_entries.title: First Structured Payment to ReZonance
timeline_entries.description: First structured payment to ReZonance (R40,000), attempt to manage debt through partial payments

timeline_entries.title: ReZonance Final Balance Persistent Debt
timeline_entries.description: Final balance showing persistent debt to ReZonance (R1,035,361.34) despite payment claims, debt continues to grow

timeline_entries.title: False Payment Claim #1 to ReZonance
timeline_entries.description: RegimA claims payment of R470,000 to ReZonance not reflected in ReZonance records, first documented false payment claim

timeline_entries.title: False Payment Claim #2 to ReZonance
timeline_entries.description: Additional false payment claims totaling R765,361.34 to ReZonance, escalation of fraudulent payment claims

timeline_entries.title: Kayla Pretorius Death - Trigger Event
timeline_entries.description: Death of Kayla Pretorius, business manager for RegimA companies. This event triggers Peter's business appropriation scheme to avoid R18.75M Ketoni payout.

evidence: SF7 - Court order for email seizure
evidence_support.significance: Death triggers Peter's appropriation of business operations

timeline_entries.title: R900,000 Unauthorized Transfers from RegimA SA
timeline_entries.description: Peter made unauthorized transfers of R900,000 from RegimA SA without Daniel's authority as co-director

timeline_entries.title: RegimA SA Revenue Diversion Started
timeline_entries.description: Diversion of revenue streams from RegimA SA initiated, marking the beginning of systematic revenue hijacking

timeline_entries.title: R5.4M Stock Disappears from Strategic Logistics
timeline_entries.description: R5.4M worth of stock physically disappears from Strategic Logistics warehouse. Represents 46% of annual sales, 10x historical adjustment rate. Same stock type later supplied by Adderory (Rynette's son's company) to RegimA.

timeline_entries.title: Trust Structure Establishment
timeline_entries.description: Foundation for R2.85M+ trust violations established through trust structure manipulation

ad_res_j7_references: ANNEXURES/JF10/ - Trust deed and fiduciary duty analysis

timeline_entries.title: R5.4M Stock Adjustment Processed Without Investigation
timeline_entries.description: R5.4M written off as simple 'stock adjustment' without investigation, supporting documentation, or proper authorization. Bantjies as accountant should have investigated 46% loss but did not, demonstrating complicity.

timeline_entries.title: Two Years Unallocated Expenses Dumped
timeline_entries.description: Rynette and Peter dumped two years' worth of unallocated expenses from all companies into RegimA Worldwide and pressured Daniel to sign off within 12 hours for SARS VAT & Annual Accounts. Daniel used time until June 6th to finalize reports and uncover fraud.

timeline_entries.title: Payment Redirection Scheme
timeline_entries.description: Part of R4.28M+ financial diversions. Payments redirected from platform owned/paid by RegimA Zone Ltd (UK)

timeline_entries.title: Bank Account Change Letter for RegimA Worldwide
timeline_entries.description: Setup for R3.14M+ revenue theft. First documented act in coordinated scheme. Attempted redirect of payments from Dan's UK-funded infrastructure

timeline_entries.title: Unauthorized Beneficiary Changes
timeline_entries.description: Exclusion of legitimate beneficiaries. Direct violation of trust obligations and beneficiary rights

ad_res_j7_references: ANNEXURES/JF10/ - Trust deed and fiduciary duty analysis

timeline_entries.title: Jacqui Confronts Rynette About R1,035,000 Debt
timeline_entries.description: Jacqui confronted Rynette regarding R1,035,000 owed by RegimA Skin Treatments to Rezonance since Feb 2023. Jacqui stated these funds were part of Kayla's estate and keeping them would be profiting from proceeds of murder.

timeline_entries.title: Unauthorized Transfers (R850K+)
timeline_entries.description: R850,000+ unauthorized transfers. Direct evidence of financial authority abuse and theft. R850K+ included revenue from platform paid by UK company (28 months)

timeline_entries.title: Shopify Audit Trail Hijacking
timeline_entries.description: CRITICAL EVENT: R1M+ monthly revenue → R0 (100% business shutdown). Central evidence destruction event proving consciousness of guilt. Destruction of audit trails for platform owned, paid, operated by RegimA Zone Ltd (UK) since July 2023 - proves RWD ZA has no independent revenue stream. Orders removed from Shopify following Jacqui's confrontation.

timeline_entries.title: Domain Registration (Identity Fraud)
timeline_entries.description: Customer hijacking platform. Family conspiracy escalation and digital impersonation. Domain registered to impersonate business on Dan's UK-funded platform. New domain regimaskin.co.za registered by Adderory (Rynette's son's company) following Shopify shutdown.

timeline_entries.title: Daniel Finalizes Fraud Reports
timeline_entries.description: Daniel finalized reports uncovering fraud after using time from March 30 deadline extension

timeline_entries.title: Secret Card Cancellations
timeline_entries.description: Secret cancellation of cards to sabotage Daniel's ability to pay creditors. Rynette may have opened 8 ABSA accounts using Daniel's stolen card.

timeline_entries.title: Bantjies Dismisses Audit Request
timeline_entries.description: CRITICAL EVENT: Bantjies dismisses Daniel's audit request 4 days after Daniel exposed Villa Via fraud. Audit would have discovered R5.4M stock adjustment fraud and systematic inter-company manipulation. Demonstrates consciousness of guilt and protection of fraud scheme.

timeline_entries.title: Bantjies Dismisses Audit Request
timeline_entries.description: Bantjies dismisses Daniel's audit request 4 days after fraud exposure (June 6), demonstrating consciousness of guilt and conflict of interest given R18.685M debt to trust

timeline_entries.title: Systematic Trust Violations
timeline_entries.description: Trustee misconduct and self-dealing. Clear evidence of trustee misconduct and self-dealing

ad_res_j7_references: ANNEXURES/JF10/ - Trust deed and fiduciary duty analysis

timeline_entries.title: Email Impersonation Pattern and Domain Switch Instruction
timeline_entries.description: R3.1M+ losses enabled by email control. Pattern of impersonation supporting criminal conspiracy charges. Email control facilitated fraud related to platform paid by Dan's UK company since July 2023. Email from Gee in Aug explained to Jax that she was instructed to send out 'don't use regima.zone only use regimaskin.co.za email'.

timeline_entries.title: Domain Switch Email Instruction
timeline_entries.description: Gee instructed to send email: 'don't use regima.zone only use regimaskin.co.za email', active customer diversion to fraudulent domain owned by Adderory

timeline_entries.title: Rynette Farrar Dual Account Access - Peter Email Impersonation
timeline_entries.description: Sage user access screenshot reveals Rynette Farrar has two user accounts with access to RegimA Worldwide Distribution: Pete@regima.com (Peter's email) and rynette@regima.zone (her own email).

evidence_support.primary_evidence: SF2A - Sage Control User Access screenshot (20 June 2025)
evidence_support.significance: Proves Rynette has access to Peter's email and can impersonate him in accounting system

timeline_entries.title: Coordinated Fund Diversions
timeline_entries.description: Complex financial flow manipulation. Evidence of sophisticated financial crime coordination. Fund diversions targeted revenue from infrastructure continuously funded by RegimA Zone Ltd

timeline_entries.title: Warehouse POPI Violations
timeline_entries.description: Complete operational shutdown. Documented evidence of systematic business destruction. Shutdown of operations for platform continuously funded by RegimA Zone Ltd (28 months)

timeline_entries.title: Account Manipulation
timeline_entries.description: Financial control seizure. Documented evidence of financial system abuse and unauthorized control. Control seized over accounts receiving Shopify revenue from Dan's UK-paid platform

timeline_entries.title: Sage Accounting System Subscription Expired
timeline_entries.description: Sage accounting system subscription for RegimA Worldwide Distribution expired. Rynette Farrar identified as subscription owner with sole control over reactivation.

evidence_support.primary_evidence: SF2B - Sage expiry notice screenshot (25 August 2025)
evidence_support.significance: Demonstrates obstruction of access to financial records for over 1 month

timeline_entries.title: Trust Asset Misappropriation
timeline_entries.description: Trust property theft. Documented theft of trust property and breach of fiduciary duty

ad_res_j7_references: ANNEXURES/JF10/ - Trust deed and fiduciary duty analysis

timeline_entries.title: Trust Breach Evidence
timeline_entries.description: Complete compromise of trust integrity. Systematic evidence of ongoing trust law violations

ad_res_j7_references: ANNEXURES/JF10/ - Trust deed and fiduciary duty analysis

timeline_entries.title: Gee Email Explaining Domain Switch Instruction
timeline_entries.description: Email from Gee to Jax explaining that she was instructed to send out 'don't use regima.zone only use regimaskin.co.za email' on June 20, 2025. Confirms customer hijacking scheme.

timeline_entries.title: Financial Evidence Concealment
timeline_entries.description: Cover-up operations demonstrating guilt. Consciousness of guilt through evidence destruction attempts. Cover-up attempt to conceal fact that RWD ZA has no independent revenue stream - all revenue from Dan's UK-funded Shopify platform

timeline_entries.title: Accounts Emptied
timeline_entries.description: Accounts emptied, potentially because Daniel was still managing to pay creditors despite 6 months of sabotage
